messages.content: It doesn't have to be like this. I don't accept that Britain is doomed to the most extreme version of Brexit backed by Theresa May. I won't let the Conservatives take our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation. Not without a fight.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats WILL fight to stop Theresa May’s extreme Brexit wrecking our country’s future.
Stop the Conservatives from taking our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation.
Allow a vote to stay in the EU if Theresa May brings a bad Brexit deal.

issues.brexitEurope: I don't accept that Britain is doomed to the most extreme version of Brexit backed by Theresa May. The Liberal Democrats WILL fight to stop Theresa May’s extreme Brexit wrecking our country’s future. If in two years' time Theresa May brings us a bad Brexit deal, YOU should be able to vote on it and have the option to stay in the EU.
issues.health: I won't let the Conservatives take our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation.

leaflet.personalStatement: I don't accept that Britain is doomed to the most extreme version of Brexit backed by Theresa May. I won't let the Conservatives take our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation. Not without a fight.

examples: The Liberal Democrats WILL fight to stop Theresa May’s extreme Brexit wrecking our country’s future.
It doesn't have to be like this.
I don't accept that Britain is doomed to the most extreme version of Brexit backed by Theresa May.
I won't let the Conservatives take our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation. Not without a fight.
If in two years' time Theresa May brings us a bad Brexit deal, YOU should be able to vote on it and have the option to stay in the EU.
If Theresa May brings back a poisoned apple, we shouldn't have to eat it.
I'm talking about the future of our NHS and schools here in Bermondsey and Old Southwark.
